item.title: Setup Raspberry Pi Operating System Boot Drive(s)
item.description: Download Etcher Download Raspberry Pi OS Lite Since this will be a kubernetes node, I don’t need the Raspberry Pi dektop installed Unzip the downloaded file Insert SD card into SD card reader (SanDisk Extreme 32 GB A1 U3) Etcher Steps Click Flash from file Select the downloaded .img file Click target (the SD card) Click Flash! (enter password if needed and accept permission requets) Setup ssh
